text:
="preserve">Bhagirathi Majhi (1 February 1954 – 2 November 2020) was an Indian politician. He was born in Murumdihi, Mayurbhanj. He was a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party. He was a Member of the Parliament of India representing Orissa in the Rajya Sabha from 2006 to 2010.
Majhi died on 2 November 2020 in Bhubaneswar, Odisha from COVID-19 at the age of 66.
